name: MYRIAD GENETIC LABORATORIES INC
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions:
Implementation of PL 113-93 (H.R. 4302): Protecting Access to Medicare Act of 2014.
Implementation of changes to Medicare payment for clinical laboratory tests.
FDA regulation of laboratory developed

FDA draft guidance to regulate laboratory developed tests and companion diagnostics.
Legislation to further regulate clinical labs under CLIA and/or FDA (legislation not yet introduced).
